snippet.title: Pandemic Express - Launch Trailer | Out now on Steam
snippet.description:
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/939510/Pandemic_Express__Zombie_Escape/

In Pandemic Express - Zombie Escape, a group of human players try to outrun a human-controlled swarm of infected. Everyone spawns in a train station until one is randomly infected and needs to turn fleeing survivors into zombies. Survivors try to escape by train. Think Zombie Escape mods set in a large open world.

Learn all about Pandemic Express at https://imgur.com/gallery/q4Y1ArQ 

Wishlist on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/939510/Pandemic_Express__Zombie_Escape/
